__TOC__

Additionally to server, client and educational software, edubuntu should provide a decent mount of data commonly used in educational environments like free digital maps, a encyclopedia, free graphics collections, dictionarys, audiofiles or wordbooks. If you know about any of such free available data that is not listed here yet, '''please add it as a suggestion to the table below.'''
